snippet: Chung Mong-joon of South Korea said he was facing a 15-year suspension by FIFA’s ethics committee, hampering his campaign for the FIFA presidency.
abstract: Chung Mong Joon of South Korea says FIFA ethics committee may give him 15-year suspension over accusations surrounding his support for country's 2022 World Cup bid; denies wrongdoing and vows to continue bid for FIFA presidency.
lead_paragraph: Chung Mong-joon of South Korea said he was facing a 15-year suspension by FIFA’s ethics committee, hampering his campaign for the FIFA presidency.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; FIFA Candidate’s Setback
